Comment: This response provides a thorough and detailed exploration of the significance of the title "Son of Man" in the context of Jesus' identity. The student effectively connects the term to Jesus' humanity, Old Testament origins, messianic implications, servant role, and eschatological significance. The explanation is coherent, well-supported with scriptural references, and demonstrates a solid understanding of Christian theological concepts related to Jesus' identity. Well done!
